description: This Kotlin file defines the SettingsFragment class, which is a UI component in an Android application responsible for displaying user settings, specifically a logout button that interacts with an AuthViewModel to handle user logout actions.

classes.name: SettingsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays settings options, including a logout button, and manages user interaction for account actions.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML when the view is created.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up the view once created, particularly attaching a click listener to the logout button.
